text:
> If I start a julia session in that env and use Utils it will recompile every time, even if there have been no changes to Utils.jl
It will only precompile if you are changing the package, right? You can run with precompilation disabled via `--compiled-modules=no`. But better might be to look inte Revise, to not have to restart Julia when iterating

text: Yeah, I'm using Revise too, this pain point is really just when starting a fresh session.  Maybe something weird with dropbox, because it precompiles even when there are *no* changes.

text: Yea, I'm thinking that Dropbox maybe "touching" your files, making Julia think they were updated.
